dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: The world reforms around you. The path is brighter now, the trees less skeletal, more noble. The sky is a hopeful grey.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: You did your duty without question. You saved the world. It is a cleaner, better story now.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: But the absence of the Princess has created a vacuum. A new threat, drawn to the story's void, begins to stir in the woods. Your work is not yet done, hero.
A hero's reward is not rest, but the next battle. The story must continue, and you are its unwavering champion.
